name: Death Riser
description:
Made for the [Game dev tv jam]

---------------------

Play as a knight who doesn't understand how death works and escape the tower. You've been exiled for your inability to die and locked away in a tower, never to be seen again.. or so you thought.

Kill yourself to slowly make your way up the tower, taking on a spiritual form to float right through the ceiling and up to the next level of the building! 

------------------

Didn't get as much done as I would've hoped but alas.. had a ton of IRL stuff get in the way so couldn't get enough time in for the jam. Hope to do a bit of bug fixing post-jam to get it working proper!

Bug at the beginning of the game where some of the spikes just wont kill you or send you up as a spirit long enough. 

---

Controls:

LEFT/RIGHT Arrow Keys or A/S to move

Jump / W / UP key to jump

------------------
